channel.title: 🏢 School of Advanced Interdisciplinary Studies, Hunan University of Technology and Business on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Advanced Interdisciplinary Studies, Hunan University of Technology and Business on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Parameterized Approximation Schemes for Fair-Range Clustering
item.description: First parameterized approximation schemes for fair-range k-median & k-means in Euclidean spaces are presented, offering faster (1+ε)-approximation algorithms.
